Class ec.id.capabilities.Speech 

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--ec.id.capabilities.Speech
public class Speech
extends Object
implements Serializable
Representation of speech for telepathy. Instances of this class are Serializable and meant to be passed over the wire in the call to sendTelepathy in the TelepathyCapability.

Author:
Scott B. Lewis, slewis@communities.com
See Also:
Telepathy, TelepathyHandler, TelepathyImpl, TelepathyCapability, Serialized Form
